data.title: Eastgate Funeral & Cremation Services
data.meta_description: Wade J. Evenson, 36, Bismarck, passed away on March 11, 2024.A memorial service will be held at 3:00 PM, Friday, March 22, at Eastgate Funeral Service, 2302 E Divide Ave, Bismar...
data.text:
Wade J. Evenson, 36, Bismarck, passed away on March 11, 2024.

A memorial service will be held at 3:00 PM, Friday, March 22, at Eastgate Funeral Service, 2302 E Divide Ave, Bismarck and again at 2PM, Saturday, April 6, at Evanger Lutheran Church, 1311 16th St NE, Grand Forks, ND. (If you wish to send flowers to the service in Grand Forks, please have them delivered to the church in Grand Forks.)

Wade James Evenson was born in Grand Forks, ND on February 1, 1988, the second son of Larry and Laura (Boyd) Evenson.

Wade graduated from Thompson High School in 2006. He went on to NDSCS and graduated college in 2008 with a degree in small engine mechanics. Wade was very skilled working on small engines and operated a small business out of his home garage in Climax, MN. He held other numerous jobs in Grand Forks, Buxton, Fargo and Bismarck.

Wade enjoyed riding snowmobile and driving motorcycles, speed was no match for Wade.

Wade is survived by his parents; brother, Clint (Ferlice); and nieces, Temperance & Kya.

He was preceded in death by his grandfather, Allen Boyd; step grandmother, Esther Boyd; grandmother, Bertha Evenson; and two uncles, Walter Deitz and Alvin Evenson.
